Create phase transition bead: Integration complete only when per-family readiness, contract fixtures, and end-to-end smoke beads are closed
Create phase transition bead: Security complete only when vulnerability, secret hygiene, tenant isolation, SoD, and sandboxing beads are closed
Create phase transition bead: Release complete only when ci:pr, quality gates, review audit, and QA evidence are closed
Create release freeze criteria bead: block new families from start while release closure bead is unresolved

Create CI gate bead: require architecture-guard, gate-baseline, and npm audit before each merge
Create CI gating bead: require OpenAPI parser/golden fixture parity on every push and PR for all operationIds
Create test evidence bead: require coverage thresholds on all newly added domain/application/infrastructure code
Create test evidence bead: require mutation-test or targeted fault-injection tests for policy and SoD logic before closure
Create review bead: tie each spec in .specify/specs to at least one implementation and one test bead
Create review bead: tie each open implementation bead to at least one test evidence bead and one code-review bead before transition
